snippet.title: Cryptical Path - Official Developer Overview Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Join game director Jérémy Boisson for a deep dive into Cryptical Path, including gameplay, your objective, a breakdown about the importance of the Hexium map, and some of the other features of the upcoming rogue-lite dungeon crawler game. Cryptical Path is coming to PC, and a demo is available now on Steam. In Cryptical Path, play the Architect, build your own path, and tame an ever-changing labyrinth you've been trapped in.
